improved_heroic_strike.label: Improved Heroic Strike
improved_heroic_strike.description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by {a} rage point(s).

improved_rend.label: Improved Rend
improved_rend.description: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by {a}%.

improved_charge.label: Improved Charge
improved_charge.description: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by {a}.

iron_will.label: Iron Will
iron_will.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional {a}%.

improved_thunder_clap.label: Improved Thunder Clap
improved_thunder_clap.description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap by {a} rage point and increases the damage by {b}% and the slowing effect by an additional {c}%.

improved_overpower.label: Improved Overpower
improved_overpower.description: Increase the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by {a}%.

anger_management.label: Anger Management
anger_management.description: Generates {a} rage per 3 seconds while in combat.

deep_wounds.label: Deep Wounds
deep_wounds.description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing {a}% of your melee weapon's average damage over 12 seconds.

two_handed_weapon_specialization.label: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
two_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by {a}%.

impale.label: Impale
impale.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive and Berserker stance by {a}%.

improved_slam.label: Improved Slam
improved_slam.description: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by {a} sec.

poleaxe_specialization.label: Poleaxe Specialization
poleaxe_specialization.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by {a}%.

sweeping_strikes.label: Sweeping Strikes
sweeping_strikes.description: Your next {a} melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

mace_specialization.label: Mace Specialization
mace_specialization.description: Gives your melee attacks a chance to stun your target for 3 seconds and generate {a} rage when using a mace.

sword_specialization.label: Sword Specialization
sword_specialization.description: Gives you a {a}% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hittin your target with your Sword.

improved_intercept.label: Improved Intercept
improved_intercept.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by {a} sec.

improved_hamstring.label: Improved Hamstring
improved_hamstring.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a {a}% chance to immobilize the target for 5 seconds.

improved_disciplines.label: Improved Disiplines
improved_disciplines.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Retaliation, Recklessness and Shield Wall abilities by {a} min and increases their duration by {b} sec.

blood_frenzy.label: Blood Frenzy
blood_frenzy.description: Your Rend and Deep Wounds abilities also increase all physical damage caused to that target by {a}%.

mortal_strike.label: Mortal Strike
mortal_strike.description: A viscious strike that deals weapon damage plus {a} and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

second_wind.label: Second Wind
second_wind.description: Whenever you are struck by a Stun or Immobilize effect you will generate {a} rage and {b}% of your total health over 10 seconds.

endless_rage.label: Endless Rage
endless_rage.description: You generate {a}% more rage from damage dealt.

empowered_rend.label: Empowered Rend
empowered_rend.description: The damage dealt by Rend is {a} seconds faster.

bladestorm.label: Bladestorm
bladestorm.description:
Instantly Whirlwind up to 4 nearby targets and for thr next 6 seconds you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec.

While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear, you cannot be stopped unless killed, and your movement speed cannot be reduced below 60%.

cruelty.label: Cruelty
cruelty.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by {a}%.

booming_voice.label: Booming Voice
booming_voice.description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Commanding Shout by {a}%.

improved_demoralizing_shout.label: Improved Demoralizing Shout
improved_demoralizing_shout.description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by {a}%.

unbridled_wrath.label: Unbridled Wrath
unbridled_wrath.description: 'Gives you a chance to generate an additional {a} rage point(s) when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

improved_cleave.label: Blood Craze
improved_cleave.description: Regenerates {a}% of your total Health over 6 seconds after being the victim of a critical strike.

piercing_howl.label: Piercing Howl
piercing_howl.description: Causes all enemies within 10 yards to be Dazed, reducing movement speed by {a}% for 6 seconds.

blood_craze.label: Improved Cleave
blood_craze.description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by {a}%.

commanding_presence.label: Commanding Presence
commanding_presence.description: Increases the melee Attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by {a}%.

dual_wield_specialization.label: Dual Wield Specialization
dual_wield_specialization.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by {a}%.

enrage.label: Enrage
enrage.description: 'Gives you a {a}% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

improved_execute.label: Improved Execute
improved_execute.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Execute ability by {a}.

death_wish.label: Death Wish
death_wish.description: When activated, increases your physical damage by {a}% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but increases all damage taken by 5%. Lasts 30 seconds.

weapon_mastery.label: Weapon Mastery
weapon_mastery.description:
Reduces the chance for your attacks to be dodged by {a}% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by {b}.
This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

improved_berserker_rage.label: Improved Berserker Rage
improved_berserker_rage.description: Berserker Rage ability will generate {a} rage when used.

flurry.label: Flurry
flurry.description: Increases your attack speed by {a}% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by {a}%.

bloodthirst.label: bloodthirst
bloodthirst.description:
Instantly attack the target causing {a} damage. In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health.
This effect lasts 8 seconds. Damage is based on your attack power.

improved_whirlwind.label: Improved Whirlwind
improved_whirlwind.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind ability by {a} sec.

improved_berserker_stance.label: Improved Berserker Stance
improved_berserker_stance.description: Increases attack power by {a}% and reduces threat caused by {a}% while in Berserker Stance.

single_minded_fury.label: Rampage
single_minded_fury.description:
Warrior goes on a rampage, increasing attack power by {a} and causeing most successful melee attacks to increase attack power by an additional 30.
This effect will stack up to 5 times. Lasts 30 seconds. This ability can only be used after scoring a critical hit.

improved_bloodrage.label: Improved Bloodrage
improved_bloodrage.description: Increases the instant rage generated by yor Bloodrage ability {a}.

tactical_mastery.label: Tactical Mastery
tactical_mastery.description:
You retain up to an additional {a} of your rage points when you change stances.
Also greatly increases the threat generated by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities when you are in Defensive Stance.

shield_specialization.label: Shield Specialization
shield_specialization.description: Increases your chance to block attacks by {a}% and has a {b}% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

toughness.label: Toughness
toughness.description: Increases your armor value from items by {a}%.

last_stand.label: Last Stand
last_stand.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants {a}% of your maximum health for 20 seconds. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

improved_shield_block.label: Improved Shield Block
improved_shield_block.description: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack and increases the duration by {a} second.

improved_revenge.label: Improved Revenge
improved_revenge.description: Gives your Revenge ability a {a}% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

defiance.label: Defiance
defiance.description: Increases the threat generated by your attack by {a}% while in Defensive Stance and rduces your chance to be dodged or parried by {b}%.

improved_sunder_armor.label: Improved Sunder Armor
improved_sunder_armor.description: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor and Devestate abilities by {a} rage point.

improved_disarm.label: Imporved Disarm
improved_disarm.description: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by {a} sec(s).

improved_taunt.label: Improved Taunt
improved_taunt.description: Reduced the cooldown of your Taunt ability by {a} sec alongside increasing the range by 7 yards.

improved_shieldwall.label: Improved Shield Wall
improved_shieldwall.description: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by {a} secs.

improved_shield_bash.label: Improved Shield Bash
improved_shield_bash.description: Gives your Shield Bash ability a {a}% chance to silence the target for 3 seconds.

shield_mastery.label: Shield Mastery
shield_mastery.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by {a}%.

one_handed_weapon_specialization.label: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
one_handed_weapon_specialization.description: Increases physical damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by {a}%.

improved_defensive_stance.label: Improved Defensive Stance
improved_defensive_stance.description: Reduces all spell damage taken while in Defensive Stance by {a}%.

shield_slam.label: Shield Slam
shield_slam.description:
Slam the target with your shield, causing {a} damage, modified by your shield block value and dispels 1 magic effect on the target.
Also causes a high amount of threat.

focused_rage.label: Focused Rage
focused_rage.description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by {a}.

vitality.label: Vitality
vitality.description: Increases your total Stamina by {a}% and your total Strength by {b}%.

devestate.label: Devestate
devestate.description:
Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect.
In addition, causes {a}% of weapon damage plus 15 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target.
The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.
